Package nusri.fyp.demo.service

Class StateMachineService

java.lang.Object
nusri.fyp.demo.service.StateMachineService
@Service public class StateMachineService extends Object
Service class that manages state machines for different users.
This includes starting, stopping, and retrieving progress bars and alarms for these state machines.
It also logs the machine executions, generates alarms, and manages system presets.
  • Uses stateMachineMap to store state machines by user name.
  • Uses processes to store and potentially interrupt threads associated with the state machines.
  • Caches the results of Preset retrieval in presetsCache for performance.
Since:
1.0
See Also:
  • StateMachine

  • Preset

  • ConfigService

  • Constructor Details

    • StateMachineService

      public StateMachineService(PresetRepository presetRepository, StateMachineLogRepository stateMachineLogRepository, ReviewService reviewService, ConfigService configService, ActionRepository actionRepository, ObjectRepository objectRepository, ImageSenderService imageSenderService)
      Constructor injecting required repositories and services.
      This class depends on multiple repositories and services for its internal operations.
      Parameters:
      presetRepository - the repository for managing Preset entities
      stateMachineLogRepository - the repository for managing StateMachineLog entities
      reviewService - the service responsible for replay/analytics
      configService - the service managing various configurations, including QuotaConfig
      actionRepository - the repository for action entities
      objectRepository - the repository for object entities
      imageSenderService - the image sender service.
      See Also:
      • PresetRepository
      • StateMachineLogRepository
      • ReviewService
      • ConfigService
      • VideoService
      • ActionRepository
      • ObjectRepository

  • Method Details

    • getProgressBars

      public List<ProgressBar> getProgressBars(String name)
      Retrieves the list of ProgressBar objects for a specified user's state machine.
      The progress bars are generated from all Node objects within that user's StateMachine.
      Parameters:
      name - the user identifier
      Returns:
      a list of ProgressBar objects representing the state machine's progress
      See Also:
      • ProgressBar
      • Node

    • getStateMachineByName

      public StateMachine getStateMachineByName(String name)
      Retrieves or creates (if absent) a StateMachine for a given user.
      If no machine is found for that user, it will use the first available preset from getPresets().
      Parameters:
      name - the user identifier
      Returns:
      the corresponding StateMachine
      See Also:
      • getPresets()

    • getPresets

      public List<Preset> getPresets()
      Fetches all Preset entities in the system, using a cached result if available.
      The cache is periodically cleared by cleanPresets().
      Returns:
      a list of all Preset objects
      See Also:
      • cleanPresets()

    • cleanPresets

      @Scheduled(fixedRate=60000L) public void cleanPresets()
      A scheduled task that clears the presetsCache every 60 seconds.
      This ensures that preset data is refreshed periodically.

    • getAlarms

      public List<Alarm> getAlarms(String name)
      Retrieves alarms for a given user's state machine based on node errors and timeouts.
      If the quota mode is set to "disabled", this method returns an empty list.
      Parameters:
      name - the user identifier
      Returns:
      a list of Alarm objects indicating errors or timeouts
      See Also:
      • QuotaConfig
      • Alarm

    • getPredictions

      public Map<Long,List<SinglePrediction>> getPredictions(String name)
      Retrieves the prediction data (if any) stored in the user's state machine.
      Only returns data if all stored observations are instances of SinglePrediction.
      Parameters:
      name - the user identifier
      Returns:
      a map from time in milliseconds to list of SinglePrediction objects

    • startDefault

      public void startDefault(String name)
      Starts a default StateMachine for a user, typically using the first available Preset.
      Parameters:
      name - the user identifier
      See Also:
      • getStateMachineByName(String)

    • start

      public void start(String name, Preset preset)
      Starts a StateMachine for a user using a specific Preset object.
      Parameters:
      name - the user identifier
      preset - the Preset to use
      See Also:
      • stateMachineMap

    • start

      public void start(String name, String preset)
      Starts a StateMachine for a user based on the preset name.
      Fetches the Preset from the database and then initializes a new state machine.
      Parameters:
      name - the user identifier
      preset - the name of the Preset
      See Also:
      • PresetRepository.findPresetByName(String)

    • stopByName

      public void stopByName(String user)
      Stops and removes the StateMachine for the specified user, without logging.
      Also removes the corresponding thread from processes if it exists.
      Parameters:
      user - the user identifier
      See Also:
      • stateMachineMap
      • processes

    • stopStateMachine

      public void stopStateMachine(String user)
      Stops the user's StateMachine by removing it from the map and interrupting any associated thread.
      Parameters:
      user - the user identifier
      See Also:
      • processes

    • stopAndLogStateMachine

      public void stopAndLogStateMachine(String user)
      Stops the user's StateMachine, logs the execution in the database as a StateMachineLog, and then clears the StateMachine instance.
      The logging includes timeline data and applies a filter via ReviewService.
      Parameters:
      user - the user identifier
      See Also:
      • StateMachineLog
      • stopStateMachine(String)

    • getAllPresets

      public List<String> getAllPresets()
      Retrieves all preset names available in the system.
      Returns:
      a list of preset names
      See Also:
      • PresetRepository.findAllPresetNames()

    • getAllPresetObjects

      public List<PresetDto> getAllPresetObjects()
      Retrieves detailed Preset information wrapped in PresetDto.
      Returns:
      a list of PresetDto containing preset details
      See Also:
      • PresetDto

    • addProcess

      public void addProcess(String user, Thread thread)
      Adds a process thread associated with a user for future interrupt or management.
      Parameters:
      user - the user identifier
      thread - the Thread to manage
      See Also:
      • processes

    • getStartResponse

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getStartResponse(String user, String preset)
      Helper method to build a ResponseEntity related to starting a StateMachine for a user.
      It stops any existing machine, interrupts any ongoing image sending, and then starts a new machine.
      Parameters:
      user - the user identifier
      preset - the name of the preset to start
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity that indicates success or failure
      See Also:
      • start(String, Preset)
      • stopStateMachine(String)

    • clearAndUpdateToTime

      public void clearAndUpdateToTime(String name, double timestamp)
      Clears the current StateMachine for a user and updates its internal timeline to a specific timestamp.
      This method is often used for replaying or skipping to a certain time in a process.
      Parameters:
      name - the user identifier
      timestamp - the timestamp (in seconds) to jump to
      See Also:
      • getStateMachineByName(String)
      • StateMachine.clearAndUpdateToTime(double, ConfigService, List, List)
